sentences.en: His romantic yarns salted with Marxist rhetoric had put her in mind of Malraux.
sentences.cn: 他那富于浪漫气息的奇谈,添上马克思主义的词藻,使她想起马尔罗.

sentences.en: It goes against the Marxist principles.
sentences.cn: 这违反马克思主义原则.

sentences.en: It is a very important mission for Marxist philosophy.
sentences.cn: 拯救辩证法的批判本性,是马克思所面临的重大理论使命.

sentences.en: KE: We are Marxist, why can not it good to talk about?
sentences.cn: 柯: 我们都是马克思主义者, 为什么不可以好好谈谈 呢 ?

sentences.en: Lenin fought stubbornly for the purity of Marxist theory.
sentences.cn: 列宁顽强地为维护马克思主义学说的纯洁性而战斗.

sentences.en: Marxist theory is not a dogma but a guide to action.
sentences.cn: 马克思主义理论从来不是教条,而是行动的指南.

sentences.en: None - Marxist economists define capitalism in terms of resource use and control, without reference to exploitation.
sentences.cn: 非 马克思主义经济学家依据资源的使用和控制来解释资本主义, 而不是涉及到剥削.

sentences.en: She's a convinced Marxist, Buddhist, etc.
sentences.cn: 她是坚定的马克思主义者 、 佛教徒等.

sentences.en: That kind of person is anything but a Marxist.
sentences.cn: 那种人根本不是马克思主义者.

sentences.en: The film retells the famous legend with a Marxist spin.
sentences.cn: 这部电影用马克思主义的观点重述了那个著名的传说.

sentences.en: The new vicar's a Marxist that'll set the cat among the pigeons!
sentences.cn: 新来的牧师是马克思主义者 -- 这下子可要鸡犬不宁了.

sentences.en: The philosophy world has a variety of understandings of Marxist philosophy.
sentences.cn: 摘要哲学界存在着对马克思主义哲学的各式各样的理解.

sentences.en: There was a crude Marxist guidance.
sentences.cn: 有一种马克思主义的简单指导.

sentences.en: This revisionist thesis departs even further from Marxist assertions.
sentences.cn: 这篇修正主义的论文更加偏离了马克思主义的主张。

sentences.en: We must always hold on to the Marxist - Leninist principles.
sentences.cn: 我们必须永远坚持马克思主义 列宁主义 原则.

trans.tran_en: relating to or based on Marxism
